```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
df_ca <- read_csv("df_ca.csv")
#View(df_ca)
```

```{r}
df_ca_f <- df_ca %>%
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
summ_by_price <- df_ca_f %>%
  group_by(price, hour) %>%
  summarise(avg_rating = mean(rating))
  
```


```{r}
ggplot(summ_by_price, aes(x=hour, y = avg_rating, group = price, color = price)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2) + 
  geom_line()
```
